text: Mariela Campos (born 4 January 1991) is a Costa Rican international footballer who plays as a midfielder for the Costa Rica women's national football team. She appeared in one match for Costa Rica at the 2018 CONCACAF Women's Championship. ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football midfielders Category:Costa Rican women's footballers Category:Costa Rica women's international footballers Category:Pan American Games competitors for Costa Rica Category:Footballers at the 2011 Pan American Games
title: Mariela Campos
